title: Drawing, "Ares, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: ariate primavera 1; in graphite, upper center: Capricornia/ Ariete (the latter crossed out); in graphite: squared off at left 1-4 and at top 1-8 with light source symbol at upper left
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ares, Lunette for Ceiling, Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1179.
